Basic Testing Theory: What is testing, bug reports, documentation, types, methods, testing directions, SDLC, STLC
HTTP: methods, codes, HTTP request and response structures
API, Postman: API testing via Postman, JS, API autotests
Charles, Fiddler: Sniffing http web traffic, mobile traffic via Charles and Fiddler on iOS and Android
SQL Basics: Create, Delete, Drop, Insert Into, Select, From, Where, Join
VPN: How it works, why you need it, how to use it, tool options
Mobile testing: Feature iOS, Android, guidelines, building iOS applications on Xcode, building Android applications on Android Studio,  ADB
Python: learning the basics. Creating a client-server application
